aboutme.name: Ali Hatem
bio: A software engineer with a strong focus on React and Next.js ‚öõÔ∏è.
Passionate about creating visually stunning user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript üíª.
Let's collaborate and craft exceptional web experiences together! üåü

Projects.title: NoviraHealth
Projects.description: Led front-end development for a healthcare marketing platform using React 18 and TypeScript. Architected component structure with shadcn/ui, integrated Sanity CMS with custom GROQ queries, and built a global modal system for contact forms. Implemented smooth Framer Motion animations and optimized SEO using react-helmet-async. Delivered a fully responsive, accessible interface.

Projects.title: E3melbusiness Org
Projects.description: Developed the complete UI for E3mel Business website. Built pixel-perfect interfaces from Figma designs, implemented responsive layouts for all screen sizes, and optimized performance through code minification. Collaborated closely with designers to ensure design fidelity while maintaining clean, maintainable Tailwind CSS code structure.

Projects.title: EBU Website
Projects.description: Built the complete front-end for Entrepreneurship & Business University (EBU) from scratch. Developed custom Tailwind configuration with branded color palette (gold/burgundy), implemented responsive mobile-first layouts, and created reusable navigation dropdowns, mobile drawer menu, and accordion components using vanilla JavaScript. Optimized for performance with zero build process overhead.

Projects.title: alHawmah Cultural Hub
Projects.description: Developed a modern React-based cultural hub website showcasing regional heritage. Built reusable component library with shadcn/ui, implemented smooth page transitions, and created an intuitive navigation system. Focused on delivering an engaging user experience with optimized performance using Vite.

Projects.title: McKeon Dashboard
Projects.description: Built a comprehensive Arabic RTL property management admin dashboard using static HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented complete CRUD interfaces with DataTables for listings, integrated ApexCharts for analytics visualization, and utilized FullCalendar for appointment scheduling. Developed with Bootstrap 5, Select2 dropdowns, Flatpickr date pickers, and SweetAlert2 notifications. Features custom gold/green color scheme and Cairo Arabic font.

Projects.title: Roya Training Packages
Projects.description: Developed a static Arabic RTL website for Roya Training Packages, a training and educational services company. Implemented the full front-end using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with Bootstrap 5 RTL, Swiper.js carousels, WOW.js animations, and jQuery-based interactions. Focused on reusable section layouts, custom button system, and responsive design across all breakpoints.

Projects.title: El-Zakeroon
Projects.description: Developed a free Islamic web app for tracking daily adhkar using Next.js and TypeScript. Implemented state management for tracking progress, built an intuitive counter interface, and ensured RTL support for Arabic content. Focused on accessibility and mobile-first responsive design.

Projects.title: Contiva
Projects.description: Built a modern content discovery platform from the ground up using React and Vite. Designed and implemented a sleek component architecture with shadcn/ui, created responsive layouts for all devices, and optimized the user interface for seamless content exploration and navigation.

Projects.title: Saudi National Day
Projects.description: Designed and developed a promotional landing page for Saudi National Day campaign. Created visually striking UI with themed color palette, implemented engaging animations, and built responsive layouts optimized for conversions. Delivered under tight deadline while maintaining high code quality.

Projects.title: 1M Brothers
Projects.description: Led entire front-end development for my graduation project - a donation platform for patient cases. Built complex forms for case submissions with document uploads, integrated payment gateway, and implemented Redux state management for user flows. Designed intuitive UI/UX and connected with backend APIs for real-time data.

Projects.title: EBU Certificate
Projects.description: Built a professional landing page for EBU's certification program. Developed clean, conversion-focused UI with clear call-to-actions, implemented smooth scroll animations, and ensured cross-browser compatibility. Created responsive design optimized for lead generation.

Projects.title: shahadat alhadaf
Projects.description: Developed a certificate showcase landing page featuring 50+ accredited programs. Built dynamic certificate filtering system, implemented engaging hover effects, and created a visually organized grid layout. Optimized for fast loading and mobile responsiveness.

Projects.title: Alshaatir Academy
Projects.description: Developed an educational platform using Next.js with server-side rendering for optimal performance. Built interactive lesson components, implemented quiz/test functionality, and created student progress tracking UI. Designed intuitive navigation for seamless learning experience across devices.

Projects.title: Hadafik Altaelimia
Projects.description: Built a free educational platform landing page with course catalog UI. Implemented responsive card layouts for courses, created smooth navigation with anchor links, and developed interactive elements to boost user engagement. Focused on clean code structure and maintainability.

Projects.title: Mr Mohamed
Projects.description: Developed a bilingual personal portfolio with Arabic/English language switching and RTL support. Implemented dark/light theme toggle with localStorage persistence, built responsive layouts for all sections, and created smooth transitions between language modes.

Projects.title: Mr Abdullah
Projects.description: Built a professional bilingual portfolio featuring Arabic/English support with seamless RTL/LTR switching. Developed custom dark/light theme system, implemented smooth scroll navigation, and created engaging profile sections with optimized performance.

Projects.title: Mr Ahmed
Projects.description: Created a polished bilingual portfolio with full Arabic/English localization. Implemented theme switching functionality, built responsive grid layouts for achievements display, and ensured cross-browser compatibility. Delivered pixel-perfect design implementation.

Projects.title: Fawri Elmaliiik
Projects.description: Developed a full-stack customer management system for express agency offices. Built complex CRUD interfaces with Material UI, implemented Redux for state management, integrated Firebase for real-time data sync, and created RESTful API endpoints with Node.js. Designed intuitive dashboards with search and filtering capabilities.

Projects.title: Salil
Projects.description: "Saleel" is an architectural masterpiece that embodies the highest meanings of luxury and comfort. Designed to be more than just a residence, it is an integrated lifestyle that offers its residents an exceptional experience combining the tranquility of nature with the liveliness of the city, while providing all the amenities and services that meet your aspirations.

Projects.title: Makhabrash
Projects.description: Built an anonymous messaging platform from concept to deployment. Developed React components for message creation and display, integrated Firebase Firestore for real-time message storage, implemented user profile generation with shareable links, and created a clean, modern UI with Tailwind CSS.

Projects.title: ReactJs Ecommerce
Projects.description: Developed a complete e-commerce front-end with React and Redux. Built product catalog with filtering/sorting, implemented shopping cart with persistent state, created checkout flow with form validation, and integrated product APIs. Focused on smooth user experience and responsive design.

Projects.title: Lecture management and attendance recording system
Projects.description: Built a lecture management system with React and Firebase. Developed attendance tracking interface, created scheduling components with calendar integration, and implemented real-time data sync. Designed clean Material UI dashboards for instructors to manage classes efficiently.

Projects.title: Dr. Mayada Salah
Projects.description: A personal website for Dr. Mayada Salah, showcasing her professional profile, achievements, and contact information.

Projects.title: mohammed-al-huwaila
Projects.description: Developed a professional React portfolio with dynamic content loading via API. Implemented Redux for state management, built responsive layouts with Bootstrap, and created smooth navigation transitions. Optimized for performance and SEO.

Projects.title: thamer-al-suwait
Projects.description: Built a modern portfolio website using React with Redux state management. Created reusable components for portfolio sections, integrated API for dynamic content, and implemented responsive Bootstrap grid layouts with custom styling.

Projects.title: saoud-al-asfour
Projects.description: Developed a clean portfolio website with React and API integration. Built modular component architecture, implemented smooth scroll navigation, and created engaging animations. Ensured cross-device compatibility with responsive Bootstrap layouts.

Projects.title: abdullah-mutlaq-awad-al-mutairi
Projects.description: Created a professional portfolio using React with centralized Redux state. Developed contact form functionality, built skills showcase sections, and implemented API data fetching. Delivered polished UI with attention to typography and spacing.

Projects.title: Calorie Bot
Projects.description: Built a Telegram bot using Node.js and Express. Integrated Nutritionix API for food data lookup, implemented natural language parsing for user queries, and created formatted response messages with nutritional breakdowns. Deployed and maintained the bot for real-time user interactions.

Projects.title: LaptopStore Contract
Projects.description: The Laptop Sales Project is a web application built using React.js and Material-UI, designed to streamline the process of selling laptops. It enables selling individuals to fill out a contract form and print the contract using Microsoft Print. This project simplifies the creation of laptop sales contracts.üíªüìùüñ®Ô∏è

Projects.title: greeting-card
Projects.description: A beautiful greeting card template built with React and Tailwind CSS.
